General form of the emission distribution in state $j$:
\begin{align*}
Y_{t} \;|\; S_{t} = j \sim
  \begin{cases}
  \begin{matrix}
  1 & \dots & i & \dots & M \\
  \underbrace{P(Y_{t}=1 \;|\; S_{t}=j)}_{b_{j,1}} & \dots & \underbrace{P(Y_{t}=1 \;|\; S_{t}=j)}_{b_{j,i}} & \dots & \underbrace{P(Y_{t}=M \;|\; S_{t}=j)}_{b_{j,M}}
  \end{matrix}
  \end{cases}
\end{align*}
